trans-unit.source: Provides properties for manipulating computer components such as audio, the clock, the keyboard, the file system, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 提供用於管理電腦元件，例如 audio、 時鐘、 鍵盤、 檔案系統等屬性。

trans-unit.source: The properties exposed by the `My.Computer` object return information about the computer on which the application is deployed, as determined at run time.
trans-unit.target: 所公開的屬性`My.Computer`在執行階段決定物件傳回應用程式部署所在，電腦的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this data differs from what was available on the development computer.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這項資料會在開發電腦上可用的不同。

trans-unit.source: Some members, such as the `My.Computer.Audio` object, are available only for non-server applications.
trans-unit.target: 一些成員，例如`My.Computer.Audio`物件，僅適用於非伺服器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer` object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer`物件。

trans-unit.source: |To|See| |--------|---------| |Check connection status|[How to: Check Connection Status](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Download a file|[How to: Download a File](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Upload a file|[How to: Upload a File](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a registry key|[How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Access the Clipboard|[Storing Data to and Reading from the Clipboard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)|
trans-unit.target: |若要 |請參閱 | |--------|---------| |請檢查連線狀態 |[How to︰ 檢查連接狀態](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |下載檔案 |[How to︰ 下載檔案](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |上傳的檔案 |[How to︰ 將檔案上傳](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |建立登錄機碼 |[How to︰ 建立登錄機碼，並設定其值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |存取剪貼簿 |[儲存至資料，以及讀取從剪貼簿](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)|

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.ServerComputer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.ServerComputer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides properties for accessing the current local time and Universal Coordinated Time (the equivalent to Greenwich Mean Time) from the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 從系統時鐘取得物件，提供存取目前的當地時間和全球定位時間 （格林威治標準時間到對等的項目） 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property provides easy access to the `My.Computer.Clock` object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供讓您輕鬆存取`My.Computer.Clock`物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|**Yes**| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|**Yes**|
trans-unit.target: 專案類型的可用性 |專案類型 |可用 | |------------------|---------------| |Windows Form 應用程式 |**Yes**| |類別庫 |**Yes**| |主控台應用程式 |**Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Windows 服務 |**Yes**| |網站 |**Yes**|

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Clock" name="My.Computer.Clock" href=""></xref> object for the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Clock" name="My.Computer.Clock" href=""> </xref>電腦物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides properties and methods for working with drives, files, and directories.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，提供屬性和方法，以處理磁碟機、 檔案和目錄。

trans-unit.source: This property provides easy access to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices.FileSystemProxy> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供讓您輕鬆存取<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices.FileSystemProxy>物件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices.FileSystemProxy>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|**Yes**| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|**Yes**|
trans-unit.target: 專案類型的可用性 |專案類型 |可用 | |------------------|---------------| |Windows Form 應用程式 |**Yes**| |類別庫 |**Yes**| |主控台應用程式 |**Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Windows 服務 |**Yes**| |網站 |**Yes**|

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.FileSystem" name="My.Computer.FileSystem" href=""></xref> object for the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.FileSystem" name="My.Computer.FileSystem" href=""> </xref>電腦物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides properties for getting information about the computer's memory, loaded assemblies, name, and operating system.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，提供用於取得電腦的記憶體、 載入的組件、 名稱和作業系統的相關資訊的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property provides easy access to the `My.Computer.Info` object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供讓您輕鬆存取`My.Computer.Info`物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.ComputerInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.ComputerInfo>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.ComputerInfo>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|**Yes**| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|**Yes**|
trans-unit.target: 專案類型的可用性 |專案類型 |可用 | |------------------|---------------| |Windows Form 應用程式 |**Yes**| |類別庫 |**Yes**| |主控台應用程式 |**Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Windows 服務 |**Yes**| |網站 |**Yes**|

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Info" name="My.Computer.Info" href=""></xref> object for the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Info" name="My.Computer.Info" href=""> </xref>電腦物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the computer name.
trans-unit.target: 取得電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Name` property provides functionality similar to the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Name`屬性會提供類似的功能<xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|**Yes**| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|**Yes**|
trans-unit.target: 專案類型的可用性 |專案類型 |可用 | |------------------|---------------| |Windows Form 應用程式 |**Yes**| |類別庫 |**Yes**| |主控台應用程式 |**Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Windows 服務 |**Yes**| |網站 |**Yes**|

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> containing the name of the computer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>包含電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides a property and methods for interacting with the network to which the computer is connected.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，提供與網路的電腦已連線的屬性和互動的方法。

trans-unit.source: This property provides easy access to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供讓您輕鬆存取<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network>物件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|**Yes**| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|**Yes**|
trans-unit.target: 專案類型的可用性 |專案類型 |可用 | |------------------|---------------| |Windows Form 應用程式 |**Yes**| |類別庫 |**Yes**| |主控台應用程式 |**Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫 |**Yes**| |Windows 服務 |**Yes**| |網站 |**Yes**|

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network" name="My.Computer.Network" href=""></xref> object for the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network" name="My.Computer.Network" href=""> </xref>電腦物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides properties and methods for manipulating the registry.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，提供管理登錄的屬性和方法。

trans-unit.source: This property provides easy access to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices.RegistryProxy> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供讓您輕鬆存取<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices.RegistryProxy>物件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices.RegistryProxy>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Registry" name="My.Computer.Registry" href=""></xref> object for the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Registry" name="My.Computer.Registry" href=""> </xref>電腦物件。
